short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An AI-powered assistant for web navigation and content interaction.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
navAssist: Your AI-Powered Web Navigation Assistant

Enhance your browsing experience with navAssist, an intelligent Chrome extension that brings the power of AI to your fingertips. Seamlessly integrate advanced language models into your daily web activities for increased productivity and efficiency.

Key Features:
• AI Chat: Engage in real-time conversations with various AI models directly in your browser.
• Smart Text Completion: Get intelligent suggestions as you type, powered by advanced language models.
• Grammar Correction: Instantly fix grammar and improve your writing with a simple keyboard shortcut.
• Web Page Summarization: Quickly grasp the essence of any web page with AI-generated summaries.
• Flexible UI: Choose between a floating chat window or a sidebar for seamless integration with your browsing experience.
• Multiple AI Models: Select from a variety of cutting-edge language models to suit your needs.

Perfect for:
• Students researching complex topics
• Professionals crafting important emails or documents
• Writers seeking instant grammar and style improvements
• Anyone looking to boost their productivity and writing quality online

navAssist respects your privacy and operates locally using Ollama, ensuring your data remains on your machine. Experience the future of web browsing with AI assistance at your fingertips!

Note: Requires Ollama to be installed and running on your local machine. Visit ollama.ai for more information.

Upgrade your browsing experience today with navAssist!
